Key Arguments: The legislation is compared to policies in communist China, implying it would suppress free speech.
The government and its agencies are exempt from the bill, despite being major sources of misinformation.
The government's handling of COVID-19 vaccines is criticized, claiming misinformation about their safety and effectiveness.
During the COVID-19 pandemic, dissenting views from reputable scientists and doctors were allegedly silenced.
Recent examples of censorship, such as the case involving journalist Peta Credlin, are cited as evidence of what could happen under the new legislation.
Notable Quotes: Why do you want to change democratic Australia to be the same as communist China?
The biggest promoter of misinformation and lies has come from the government.
Our Democracy and Freedom of Speech must be maintained at all costs.
